citation.article-title: Halochromatium roseum sp. nov., a non-motile phototrophic gammaproteobacterium with gas vesicles, and emended description of the genus Halochromatium
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus HalochromatiumImhoff et al. 1998
The description is as given previously (Imhoff et al., 1998; Imhoff & Caumette, 2005) with the following modifications.
Most species are without gas vesicles and grow at elevated salt concentrations, but some species possess gas vesicles and can grow only at lower salt concentrations (1–3 % NaCl w/v).
